price: ئەگەر بىز خالىساق ئۇنى تۇزلۇق قىلىپ قوياتتۇق (پەرۋەردىگارىڭلارنىڭ زور نېمەتلىرىگە) نېمىشقا شۈكۈر قىلمايسىلەر؟[70]
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ أُجَاجٗا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: law nashāu jaʿalnāhu ujājan falawlā tashkurūna
translations: then why are you not grateful
then why are you not grateful
